message.content:
I need to find the specific line item and value that represents the profit an entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement, the "Net Profit" line item represents the amount of profit retained after all expenses have been accounted for. This is the figure that shows the bottom-line profit after operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization.

From the provided cash flow statement, I can see that the Net Profit is 146127.58 as of 2024-02-01.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "146127.58"}}
```
